demolish.translation[0].definitions[0].e: The entire east wing of the building was demolished in the fire.
demolish.translation[0].definitions[1].d: to prove that an idea or opinion is completely wrong
demolish.translation[0].definitions[1].e: He demolished my argument in minutes.
demolish.translation[0].definitions[2].d: to end or ruin something completely
demolish.translation[0].definitions[2].e: These ants can demolish large areas of forest.
demolish.translation[0].definitions[4].d: to eat all of something very quickly
demolish.translation[0].definitions[4].e: He demolished a second helping of pie.
